医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
超加工食品与失眠风险有关据估计，超加工食品（UPF）可能与三分之一成年人的失眠有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240601/Ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-insomnia-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240601/Ultra-processed-foods-linked-to-insomnia-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a865ffe6-4c27-4a64-ad53-f0abcbe09808 Sat, 01 Jun 2024 20:50:32 -0400 Ultra-processed foods linked to insomnia risk
酮类有望预防认知能力下降和神经退行性变罗切斯特大学德尔蒙特神经科学研究所的研究人员已经确定了大脑海马网络中被酮拯救的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Ketones-show-promise-in-preventing-cognitive-decline-and-neurodegenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Ketones-show-promise-in-preventing-cognitive-decline-and-neurodegenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1e0e7683-aede-4d7a-9b91-e7a16169f52b Fri, 31 May 2024 13:48:00 -0400 Ketones show promise in preventing cognitive decline and neurodegeneration
从古代疗法到现代医学：无机材料为组织再生带来新希望几个世纪以来，各个文明一直使用天然存在的无机材料来获得其治疗功效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/From-ancient-remedies-to-modern-medicine-Inorganic-materials-offer-new-hope-for-tissue-regenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/From-ancient-remedies-to-modern-medicine-Inorganic-materials-offer-new-hope-for-tissue-regenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a36bcb7-826e-4164-85c7-f0abffc38c46 Fri, 31 May 2024 13:40:00 -0400 From ancient remedies to modern medicine: Inorganic materials offer new hope for tissue regeneration
研究：13% 的老年人被诊断患有创伤性脑损伤根据加州大学旧金山分校和旧金山退伍军人事务部医疗保健系统的一项研究，约 13% 的老年人被诊断患有创伤性脑损伤 (TBI) https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Study-1325-of-older-adults-diagnosed-with-traumatic-brain-injury.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Study-1325-of-older-adults-diagnosed-with-traumatic-brain-injury.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab317f85-153c-447b-9406-d16f8c766318 Fri, 31 May 2024 12:20:00 -0400 Study: 13% of older adults diagnosed with traumatic brain injury
非编码基因突变与单基因神经发育障碍有关西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员和其他人发现了一种由单个基因突变引起的神经发育障碍，影响着全世界数万人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Non-coding-gene-mutation-linked-to-monogenic-neurodevelopmental-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Non-coding-gene-mutation-linked-to-monogenic-neurodevelopmental-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dd2dcbbc-5e3a-40af-8486-eaf386abb042 Fri, 31 May 2024 12:14:00 -0400 Non-coding gene mutation linked to monogenic neurodevelopmental disorders
地中海饮食与降低女性死亡风险有关布莱根妇女医院的研究人员发现并评估了可能解释地中海饮食使美国女性全因死亡风险降低 23% 的潜在机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-lower-mortality-risk-in-women.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Mediterranean-diet-linked-to-lower-mortality-risk-in-women.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=99242c1c-9ea6-4d4d-af2c-977ef0796303 Fri, 31 May 2024 12:08:00 -0400 Mediterranean diet linked to lower mortality risk in women
调查：8270万美国人因服药过量死亡约翰·霍普金斯大学研究人员领导的一项新调查显示，近年来，因吸毒过量而失去亲人是许多美国人的普遍经历，这跨越了政治和社会经济分歧，并提高了人们对吸毒过量危机作为一个政策问题的重要性的认识。布隆伯格公共卫生学院。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Survey-827-million-Americans-impacted-by-overdose-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Survey-827-million-Americans-impacted-by-overdose-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d17b94f-b06b-4ca0-a33c-3ee783e4496d Fri, 31 May 2024 11:59:00 -0400 Survey: 82.7 million Americans impacted by overdose deaths
隐藏在常见人类寄生虫中的RNA病毒可能会加剧弓形虫病由多伦多大学研究人员领导的一个国际团队发现了一种新的 RNA 病毒，他们认为这种病毒与一种常见的人类寄生虫有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/RNA-virus-hiding-in-common- human-parasite-may-exacerbate-toxoplasmosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/RNA-virus-hiding-in-common- human-parasite-may-exacerbate-toxoplasmosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1750afea-9944-4582-b60f-8542c836560a Fri, 31 May 2024 11:53:00 -0400 RNA virus hiding in common human parasite may exacerbate toxoplasmosis
新型电磁系统可实现更安全的眼内手术该电磁驱动系统用于对后眼内的微型机器人进行灵活的 5 自由度磁操纵，从而实现精确的靶向药物输送。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Novel-emerge-system-for-safer-intralingual-surgery.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Novel-electrically-system-for-safer-intralingual-surgery.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c2ebb05e-e735-4ac7-b052-3cdfcea95203 Fri, 31 May 2024 11:46:00 -0400 Novel electromagnetic system for safer intraocular surgery
父亲和青少年之间的良好沟通会影响身体活动水平芬兰于韦斯屈莱大学的一篇博士论文发现，与父亲交谈有困难预示着身体活动的减少，以及青春期和成年早期身体活动水平较低的维持。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Good-communication- Between-fathers-and-adolescents-influences-physical-activity-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240531/Good-communication- Between-fathers-and-adolescents-influences-physical-activity-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=986c4bfd-d4d9-4ced-a566-59c948a0a287 Fri, 31 May 2024 11:39:00 -0400 Good communication between fathers and adolescents influences physical activity levels
